_header: Be merry man and take nought far in mind
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Without glaidnes awailis no tressour’ — five 8-line stanzas including this refrain

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Be mirrie man and tak nocht far in myndThe wavering of this wrechit
                    vale of sorow…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…quha leveis mirrelie levis michteliewithout glaydnes avalis
                    no trasour
